attributes.additional_details:
why i want this to happen? 
You did the same for A-levels and GCSEs you cancelled the exams and i understand why you didn't cancel them for January BTECs as the exams were taking place in a week but btecs still have to do their exams in the summer. It seems only fair that btec students get treated the same as A-level and GCSE students.
attributes.background: what i would like the government to do is for the teachers to grade their students off course work as they are doing with A-levels and GCSE students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
